item.title: 马来西亚反贪污委员会主席称愿意接受股票调查
item.description: 马来西亚反贪污委员会主席阿赞·巴基表示，对于政府设立的独立委员会就其持股事宜展开调查，他完全持开放态度。【原文：Malaysia’s anti-corruption chief Azam Baki said he’s fully open to being investigated by a government-established independent committee on matters related to his shareholding.】

item.title: 赤泽表示，日美在5500亿美元基金项目上存在巨大分歧
item.description: 日本经济产业大臣赤泽理生表示，尽管美日双方在最新一轮谈判中取得进展，但在5500亿美元投资机制框架下应优先资助哪些项目的问题上，两国仍存在较大分歧。【原文：The US and Japan remain far apart over which projects should be funded first under the framework of a $550 billion investment vehicle even as the two sides made progress in their latest round of talks, Japanese Trade Minister Ryosei Akazawa said.】

item.title: 日元有望创2024年以来最佳单周表现，因财政担忧暂告段落
item.description: 日元正朝着自2024年11月以来最大单周涨幅迈进，市场信心源于首相高市早苗的选举胜利将使其能够在扩大财政刺激的同时维持金融市场的信任。【原文：The yen is on track for its biggest weekly gain since November 2024 on confidence Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s election victory will allow her to expand fiscal stimulus while maintaining the trust of financial markets.】

item.title: 美国股市对人工智能的担忧引发全球资金涌向亚洲赢家
item.description: 华尔街对人工智能引发商业颠覆的担忧正转化为亚洲股市的福音，推动该地区主导行业供应链的领先芯片制造商需求激增。【原文：Wall Street’s fears of business disruption caused by artificial intelligence are turning into a blessing for Asian stocks, fueling demand for the region’s leading chipmakers that dominate the industry’s supply chain.】

item.title: 澳西太平洋银行警告：澳大利亚财政丰收现可与矿业繁荣相媲美
item.description: 西太平洋银行表示，澳大利亚经济正经历数十年来最大的结构性转变之一，公共支出膨胀至堪比2000年代矿业繁荣时期的水平。与此同时，针对财政计划规模及其对通胀影响的批评声浪日益高涨。【原文：Australia’s economy is undergoing one of its largest structural shifts in decades, with public spending swelling to levels that rival the mining boom of the 2000s, Westpac Banking Corp. said, as criticism mounts at the scale of fiscal programs and their impact on inflation.】

item.title: 日本前外汇局长认为日元将走强，因高市早苗立场明朗
item.description: 据日本前货币政策负责人称，随着投资者对首相高市早苗的财政立场有更清晰的认识，日元很可能走强。【原文：The yen is likely to strengthen as investors gain a clearer understanding of Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s fiscal stance, according to a former Japanese currency czar.】

item.title: 美国公布针对中国清洁能源税收抵免的新限制措施
item.description: 特朗普政府就美国清洁能源项目使用外国材料和组件发布新指导方针，此举将进一步限制获取丰厚税收抵免的机会。【原文：The Trump administration issued new guidance on the use of foreign materials and components in US clean energy projects, in a move that would further limit access to lucrative tax credits.】

item.title: 台湾经济蓬勃发展，将上调2026年增长预期，受益于人工智能与贸易协定
item.description: 台湾今年经济增长预期有望上调，尽管2025年经济增长将面临严峻挑战。此举基于两大信号：人工智能热潮仍有发展空间，且与美国最终达成贸易协议。【原文：Taiwan is set to upgrade its forecast for economic growth this year even after a torrid 2025 on signs the AI boom has room to run and a final trade deal with the US.】

item.title: 油价本周料将下跌，因伊朗担忧情绪消退，大宗商品市场整体走低
item.description: 受市场避险情绪蔓延、全球原油供应过剩担忧以及美伊核协议谈判可能长期化的影响，油价正朝着今年首次连续两周下跌的方向发展。【原文：Oil headed for the first back-to-back weekly drop this year on a risk-off tone in wider markets, concerns about a global crude glut, and the prospect of drawn out US-Iran talks over a nuclear deal.】

item.title: 金价在市场整体动荡引发的急剧下跌后趋稳
item.description: 金价在金融市场全面抛售引发的急剧下跌后趋稳，此次抛售可能因算法交易而加剧。【原文：Gold steadied after a sharp decline sparked by a wider selloff across financial markets that may have been amplified by algorithmic trading.】

item.title: 经纪商Clear Street因市场状况推迟首次公开募股
item.description: 基于云计算技术建立的华尔街经纪商Clear Street Group Inc.已推迟其美国首次公开募股计划，此前该公司将募资目标下调近三分之二。【原文：Clear Street Group Inc., a Wall Street broker built on cloud computing technology, has postponed its US initial public offering after cutting the target by nearly two-thirds.】

item.title: 据称Humana即将以10亿美元收购佛罗里达州MaxHealth公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Humana公司正就收购MaxHealth进行深入谈判，这笔交易对这家初级保健诊所运营商的估值约为10亿美元。【原文：Humana Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire MaxHealth in a deal valuing the operator of primary care clinics at about $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 秘鲁维持基准利率在4.25%不变，索尔汇率逼近六年高点
item.description: 秘鲁维持利率不变，因通胀加速升至目标区间中点附近，且索尔汇率徘徊在六年高点附近。【原文：Peru held interest rates as inflation accelerates to near the midpoint of its target range and the sol hovers near a six-year high.】

item.title: 投资者再向美国高收益债券基金注入40亿美元
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团理柏数据显示，截至本周三的一周内，美国债券投资者又向高评级债券基金注入了43亿美元资金，这是连续第十一周出现资金流入。投资者争相购买仍能提供可观收益率的债券。【原文：US bond investors poured another $4.3 billion of cash into high-grade bond funds in the week ended Wednesday, the eleventh consecutive week of inflows, according to LSEG Lipper, as investors scramble to buy debt still offering decent yields.】

item.title: 马来西亚太阳能龙头企业将扩大产能，电池价格持续走低
item.description: 马来西亚最大太阳能企业Solarvest控股有限公司计划在未来两年内将发电产能提升逾一倍，随着电池成本下降，可再生能源的部署得以进一步扩大。【原文：Malaysia’s biggest solar company Solarvest Holdings Bhd. plans to more than double its generation capacity in the next two years, as declining battery costs enables further deployment of renewables.】

item.title: 银行家短缺给处理IPO热潮的香港公司带来压力
item.description: 香港企业正积极物色更多银行家，以应对蓬勃发展的首次公开募股项目。此前长达数年的低迷期导致合格人才储备严重不足。【原文：Hong Kong firms are on the hunt for more bankers to lead a booming pipeline of initial public offering deals after a years-long dry spell depleted the ranks of qualified staffers.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将下跌，因人工智能担忧冲击华尔街：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周五料将下跌，此前新一轮与人工智能相关的看跌情绪席卷华尔街，拖累美国科技股和比特币走低，投资者纷纷涌向美国国债寻求避险。【原文：Asian stocks were set to fall Friday after a new wave of AI-linked bearishness hit Wall Street, weakening US tech and Bitcoin, and sending investors to the safety of Treasuries.】

item.title: 一场糟糕的赌注，最终导致泰国改革派惨败
item.description:
该国曾势头强劲的进步党意外败选，关键在于其九月试图拉拢对手的豪赌最终失败。【原文：

The surprise election loss by the nation’s once-surging progressive party hinged on a failed gamble in September to coopt its rival. 

】

item.title: 英伟达将租赁由38亿美元垃圾债券资助的数据中心
item.description: 英伟达公司预计将租赁一座由38亿美元垃圾债券融资建造的数据中心，此举进一步加剧了围绕人工智能基础设施的借贷热潮。【原文：Nvidia Corp. is expected to lease a data center being built with funds from a $3.8 billion junk-bond sale, adding to the borrowing frenzy around artificial-intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: OpenAI指控DeepSeek通过提炼美国模型获取竞争优势
item.description: 据彭博新闻社查阅的一份备忘录显示，OpenAI已向美国立法者发出警告，称其中国竞争对手DeepSeek正采用不公平且日益复杂的手段，从美国领先的人工智能模型中提取结果，用于训练其突破性R1聊天机器人的下一代版本。【原文：OpenAI has warned US lawmakers that its Chinese rival DeepSeek is using unfair and increasingly sophisticated methods to extract results from leading US AI models to train the next generation of its breakthrough R1 chatbot, according to a memo reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 纽约联储研究称美国企业承担了2025年关税成本近九成
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行经济学家最新研究发现，2025年关税造成的经济负担中，近90%由美国企业和消费者承担。【原文：Nearly 90% of the economic burden from tariffs in 2025 was borne by US companies and consumers, according to a new study by economists at the Federal Reserve Bank of New York found.】

item.title: 澳大利亚储备银行利率委员会新成员布鲁斯·普雷斯顿接替沃特金斯
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆·查尔默斯任命布鲁斯·普雷斯顿加入储备银行的利率制定委员会，接替艾莉森·沃特金斯。此次人事变动正值经济前景面临高度不确定性之际。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers named Bruce Preston to the Reserve Bank’s interest rate-setting board, replacing Alison Watkins at a time of heightened uncertainty for the economy’s outlook.】

item.title: Instacart发布强劲展望，预计食品杂货需求将持续增长
item.description: Instacart对2026年初的业绩展望远超分析师预期，表明其生鲜配送服务需求持续强劲。【原文：Instacart issued a strong outlook for the start of 2026 that far exceeded analyst expectations, signaling sustained demand for its grocery delivery services.】

item.title: 应用材料股价飙升，因销售预期远超市场预期
item.description: 应用材料公司股价在盘后交易中飙升10%，此前该公司给出了意外乐观的销售预测，表明人工智能和存储半导体的需求正推动设备采购。【原文：Applied Materials Inc. surged 10% in late trading after delivering a surprisingly upbeat sales forecast, signaling that demand for artificial intelligence and memory semiconductors is fueling equipment purchases.】

item.title: 爱彼迎预计2026年需求将保持强劲，推动业务加速增长
item.description: 爱彼迎公司公布了强劲的第四季度预订量，并给出了乐观的营收展望，称其得益于强劲的旅行需求以及新型灵活支付和预订选项的日益普及。【原文：Airbnb Inc. posted strong fourth-quarter bookings and issued an upbeat revenue outlook, citing strong travel demand and growing adoption of its new flexible payment and booking options.】

item.title: Expedia营收增速创三年新高，一季度业绩预期超预期
item.description: Expedia集团第四季度营收增速创三年来新高，得益于美国旅游需求依然强劲。【原文：Expedia Group Inc. fourth-quarter revenue rose at its fastest pace in three years on the back of still-resilient US travel demand.】

item.title: Pinterest因裁员及转向人工智能战略后销售预期疲软股价下跌
item.description: Pinterest公司最新季度销售额预测低于华尔街预期，而就在几周前，该公司刚宣布裁员并转向人工智能产品领域。【原文：Pinterest Inc. projected current-quarter sales that fell short of Wall Street estimates, just weeks after announcing layoffs and a pivot toward artificial intelligence products.】

item.title: Waymo尝试寻找DoorDash司机来关闭自动驾驶出租车敞开的车门
item.description: 字母表公司旗下Waymo正招募亚特兰大DoorDash司机，负责关闭无人驾驶出租车未关好的车门，使这些无人驾驶车辆得以继续行驶。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo is enlisting DoorDash Inc. drivers in Atlanta to close robotaxi doors that have been left open, letting the driverless vehicles continue on their way.】

item.title: IBM计划在美国将入门级职位招聘规模扩大三倍
item.description: 国际商业机器公司表示，尽管人工智能似乎正在抑制对初级员工的广泛需求，但该公司将在2026年将美国初级职位的招聘规模扩大三倍。【原文：International Business Machines Corp. said it will triple entry-level hiring in the US in 2026, even as artificial intelligence appears to be weighing on broader demand for early-career workers.】

item.title: 音乐产业步入"少即是多"时代
item.description: 随着每日有6万首完全由人工智能生成的曲目涌入流媒体平台，加上现有平台上超过2亿首歌曲，音乐产业正对这场冲击波日益警惕。【原文：With 60,000 wholly AI-generated tracks delivered to streaming services daily and upwards of 200 million songs on platforms, the music industry is growing wary of the onslaught】
